attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Far too much of the political energy of the UK population is being wasted in the sending and reading of e-mails asking others to sign some moronic petition that they believe the Government will heed in any way. The quality of some petitions leaves much to be desired. Pore gramma and spelling to name too. Please sign this petition, and let's get back to the tradition of handing in unfeasibly large amounts of paper at Number 10.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
